case.title: Sexy Ebony - 21 (Lower East Side)
case.text:
I just got out of a 2 year relationship and am now just looking for something drama free and fun.
I am young, tall, slim and very pretty.
You are older, educated, generous, and fun.
Lets have some dinner and get to know each other better and see if there is any chemistry.
**Your PIC gets MINE
